verses.verse: O Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430>, in you do I put my trust <WH2620>: save <WH3467> me from all them that persecute <WH7291> me <WH5337>, and deliver me:
Lest he tear <WH2963> my soul <WH5315> like a lion <WH738>, rending it in pieces <WH6561>, while there is none to deliver <WH5337>.
O Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430>, if I have done <WH6213> this <WH3426>; if there be iniquity <WH5766> in my hands <WH3709>;
If I have rewarded <WH1580> evil <WH7451> unto him that was at peace <WH7999> with me <WH2502>; (Yes, I have delivered him that without cause <WH7387> is my enemy <WH6887>:)

Let the enemy <WH341> persecute <WH7291> my soul <WH5315>, and take <WH5381> it <WH7429>; Yes, let him tread down my life <WH2416> upon the earth <WH776>, and lay <WH7931> my honor <WH3519> in the dust <WH6083>. Selah <WH5542>.

Arise <WH6965>, O Lord <WH3068>, in your anger <WH639>, lift up <WH5375> yourself because of the rage <WH5678> of my enemies <WH6887>: and awake <WH5782> for me to the judgment <WH4941> that you have commanded <WH6680>.
So shall the congregation <WH5712> of the people <WH3816> compass you about <WH5437>: for their sakes therefore return <WH7725> you on high <WH4791>.
The Lord <WH3068> shall judge <WH1777> the people <WH5971>: judge <WH8199> me <WH3068>, O Lord, according to my righteousness <WH6664>, and according to my integrity that is in me <WH8537>.

Oh let the wickedness <WH7451> of the wicked <WH7563> come to an end <WH1584>; but establish <WH3559> the just <WH6662>: for the righteous <WH6662> God <WH430> tries <WH974> the hearts <WH3826> and minds <WH3629>.
My defense <WH4043> is of God <WH430>, which saves <WH3467> the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
God <WH430> judges <WH8199> the righteous <WH6662>, and God <WH410> is angry <WH2194> with the wicked every day <WH3117>.
If he turn <WH7725> not <WH3913>, he will sharpen his sword <WH2719>; he has bent <WH1869> his bow <WH7198>, and made it ready <WH3559>.
He has also prepared <WH3559> for him the instruments <WH3627> of death <WH4194>; he ordains <WH6466> his arrows <WH2671> against the persecutors <WH1814>.
Behold <WH2254>, he travails with iniquity <WH205>, and has conceived <WH2029> mischief <WH5999>, and brought forth <WH3205> falsehood <WH8267>.
He made <WH3738> a pit <WH953>, and dug <WH2658> it <WH5307>, and is fallen into the ditch <WH7845> which he made <WH6466>.
His mischief <WH5999> shall return <WH7725> upon his own head <WH7218>, and his violent <WH2555> dealing shall come down <WH3381> upon his own head <WH6936>.
I will praise <WH3034> the Lord <WH3068> according to his righteousness <WH6664>: and will sing praise <WH2167> to the name <WH8034> of the Lord <WH3068> most high <WH5945>.
